Package ra.util.logging

Class LogEveryDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • ra.util.logging.LogEveryDay
  • public class LogEveryDay
extends java.lang.Object
    Using the Date to create a file every day, which be used to write Log. the following action: Keep the file I/O connection and will not close the file I/O connection when writing log into a file, after creating the Log file by earmark file name. Using the new Date to write a log, when the Date is changed.
